nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.credentials

Class CertificateCredentialImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.credentials.CredentialImplementation
      • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.engine.credentials.CertificateCredentialImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Credential
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SSHCertificateCredentialImplementation

    public class CertificateCredentialImplementation
extends CredentialImplementation
    A container for security Information based upon certificates. Contexts based upon these mechanisms can be used by adaptors to create further contexts containing opaque data objects, e.g. GSSAPI credentials.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String certfile
      This member variables holds the URI of the keyfile of the SecurityContext

      Constructs a CertificateCredentialImplementation out of a URI pointing to the private key, a URI pointing to the certificate, a username and a password.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CertificateCredentialImplementation

        public CertificateCredentialImplementation(java.lang.String adaptorName,
                                           java.lang.String uniqueID,
                                           XenonProperties properties,
                                           java.lang.String certfile,
                                           java.lang.String username,
                                           char[] password)
        Constructs a CertificateCredentialImplementation out of a URI pointing to the private key, a URI pointing to the certificate, a username and a password.
        Parameters:
        adaptorName - the name of the adaptor
        uniqueID - the unique ID of this certificate
        properties - the properties used to configure the implementation
        certfile - the certification file
        username - the username for this certificate
        password - the password or passphrase for this certificate
